translations.translation: You cannot access this service on this offer.
You do not get this service with the Start10m service.

Important: the password must meet the following requirements:
- Minimum {0} characters
- Maximum {1} characters
- At least one upper-case letter
- At least one lower-case letter
- At least one number
- Must only contain letters and numbers
Accepted types for the files include letters, numbers and characters. It is forbidden to access parent files using..

You are using a version of PHP that has ceased to evolve. Only security flaws will be corrected. You can update this version using the "change configuration" button on the right. By changing you may impact how your website works.
You are using a version of PHP that is no longer maintained. You can update this version using the "change configuration" button on the right. By changing you may impact how your website works.
The name must not exceed 250 characters.
When a web hosting package is deleted, all the data linked to it is lost. No refund will be granted for any deleted web hosting packages.
You will be sent an email containing the procedure for cancelling your hosting plan.
Your request to close your web hosting plan has been processed. You will receive an email detailing the procedure.
Unable to close your web hosting package due to the following error:
If you would like to migrate to a Kimsufi 2015 solution, please note that phone-based support is no longer included. You must use our ticketing system to contact our support team.
I have read and understood the Kimsufi 2015 terms and confirm that I wish to migrate
Kimsufi web hosting: support is only offered via the ticketing system (Assistance menu)
The 60free solution will be closed on the 1st of May 2017. You can migrate your ovh.org domain to another web hosting package (Migrate ovh.org domain button)
The demo1g solution will be closed on the 1st of May 2017. You can migrate your ovh.org domain to another web hosting package (Migrate ovh.org domain button)
You can choose a different service in the general information tab or you can view the list of services on our website.
What action do you want to take?
Switch to a paid hosting package in order to create a database quickly and with no interruption in service. Our services provide you with:
An FTP of at least 100 GB in size
A minimum of 10, 5 GB email addresses

If you exceed the recommended storage space, you will be limited to read-only access.

To avoid this limitation, we reccommend that you purge your database and recalculate your quotas so that you fall below the recommended limit. Your database will be automatically unlocked in a few minutes.

Select the offer that you wish to upgrade to.
You can choose any solution with more capacity than your current solution, or one with a lower capacity that is closest to your current solution.
The modification will be effective once payment is received.
Please note: If your hosting package has not yet expired, the remaining credit will not be carried over to your new service, but this service will be extended by a year as of today.
Note if you are moving to a higher offer:
If your old service has not yet expired when you switch to the new one, all of your remaining credit will be transferred to the new service.
Note if you are switching to a lower offer:
If your old hosting plan has not yet expired when you switch over, the remaining credit will not be transferred. The expiration date will be extended by a year and transferred to the new offer.

Your plan is currently boosted to the {0} plan
You want to BOOST (temporarily upgrade) to a more advanced level.
Once a month, you will be billed for the most advanced plan used in one given month (from the 1st to the 31st and not on a pro-rata basis).
If you haven't already, please save your payment method under the "Billing section/My payment methods" section in the Control Panel.
The BOOST option is renewable by tacit agreement. You may downgrade to a less advanced level at any time.

You want to downgrade to your original plan (current plan). You will be able to change your plan again afterwards. You will be billed just once next month for the boost plan used this month. The amount to pay will be based on the highest level of plan you use this month.

You are about to block emails from being sent from your web hosting plan. Emails will be queued for 72 hours, but none will be deleted. During this period, you may unblock the email sending, or purge the emails.
You're about to delete all the queued emails in your account. Afterwards, your account will be automatically unblocked. The operation will take between 5 and 10 minutes.
You are about to unblock the distribution of emails sent from your web hosting account. You will be able to send your next email. Mails that were blocked will be sent.
